creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Faegre
description: sugar tongs,bow-shaped tongs with bright-cut bands and wriggle work; fully marked on inside of tongs;  Holiday Traditions, Charleston Drawing Room
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

The initials [JCF] engraved in script on bow.
markings:
Marks

Maker\'s mark, sovereign\'s head, duty mark, lion passant, and date letter on inside of one arm of tongs.
title: Sugar Tongs
